kv18.7:2.3_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:3.3_0: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:4.1_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:4.3_0: Hañci dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikā,
kv18.7:5.1_0: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:5.3_0: Hañci tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikā,
kv18.7:6.1_0: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:6.3_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:7.1_0: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:7.3_0: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:8.1_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:8.3_0: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:9.1_0: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:9.3_0: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:14.1_0: Dvinnaṁ jhānānaṁ paṭuppannānamantare avitakko vicāramatto samādhīti?
kv18.7:14.3_0: Nanu avitakke vicāramatte samādhimhi vattamāne paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ niruddhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ paṭuppannanti?
kv18.7:14.5_0: Hañci avitakke vicāramatte samādhimhi vattamāne paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ niruddhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ paṭuppannaṁ,
kv18.7:14.6_0: “dvinnaṁ jhānānaṁ paṭuppannānamantare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantarikā”ti.
kv18.7:15.8_0: Tena hi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantarikāti.
kv18.7:16.4_0: “savitakko savicāro samādhi”, avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhī”ti?
kv18.7:16.8_0: avicāro samādhi”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
